Status.GeneratingControl_ProfileCreateWizardPan: Generating Controls: Profile Creation Wizard Panel

プロファイル編集パネル部品.AltEnter自動押下チェックボックス:
Sets whether to automatically press Alt+Enter after launching Apex Legends.
Enabling this setting can eliminate the "black bars" that appear when "stretching the resolution".
プロファイル編集パネル部品.AltEnter自動押下待機時間ダイヤル:
Sets the waiting time (seconds) before automatically pressing Alt+Enter after Apex Legends launches.
The time it takes for the title screen to appear varies depending on the environment, so please adjust this setting to suit your environment.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.AltEnter自動押下方法選択リスト:
Sets how to automatically press Alt+Enter.

  <Image Recognition>
    Automatically recognizes the title screen and presses Alt+Enter.
    If you use this setting, you need to download additional files. (They will be downloaded automatically.)

  <Time>
    Waits for the specified time after Apex Legends launches and then presses Alt+Enter.
    The time it takes for the title screen to appear varies depending on the environment, so please adjust this setting to suit your environment.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.ApexLegendsパステキスト:
Sets the path to the Apex Legends installation (executable file).
Specify the path to "r5apex.exe".
プロファイル編集パネル部品.ApexLegendsパス自動取得チェックボックス: Automatically retrieves the installation location (executable file) of Apex Legends installed on this PC.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.ApexLegendsパス自動取得ボタン:
Retrieves the installation location of Apex Legends installed on this PC.
Do this if the installation location has changed, such as after reinstalling.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.EAappSteam経由IDテキスト: Specifies the AppID of the EA app registered on Steam.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.EAappSteam経由チェックボックス:
Sets whether to launch the EA app via Steam.
To use this setting, the EA app must be registered as a Non-Steam Game on Steam.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.カーソルロックチェックボックス:
Sets whether to enable cursor lock.
Enabling this prevents the mouse cursor from moving outside the Apex Legends window when multiple monitors are connected.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.システム解像度変更チェックボックス:
Sets whether to change the system (PC) display resolution before launching Apex Legends.
Enabling this setting can prevent the phenomenon where the display resolution reverts every time you switch from Apex Legends to another window using Alt+Tab, etc., and the PC freezes for a few seconds.
(Only the main display on which Apex Legends is displayed will be changed. Sub-displays will not be changed.)
プロファイル編集パネル部品.ディスプレイスケーリングモードヘルプボタン: Displays a detailed explanation of the display scaling mode types.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.ディスプレイスケーリングモード選択リスト: Sets the display scaling mode when changing the resolution.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.ディスプレイリフレッシュレートダイヤル: Sets the refresh rate for playing.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.ディスプレイ解像度Hダイヤル: Sets the display resolution (height) for playing.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.ディスプレイ解像度Wダイヤル: Sets the display resolution (width) for playing.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.ディスプレイ設定プリセット有効項目チェックボックス:
If enabled, unsupported display settings will also be displayed in the preset list.
If an unsupported resolution or refresh rate is specified, the resolution change will fail at playtime and the game will not launch.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.ディスプレイ設定プリセット選択リスト:
Selects the display settings for playing from the presets.
The values will be entered automatically when selected.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.フルスクリーンストレッチ有効チェックボックス: Sets whether to change (stretch) the display resolution when playing Apex Legends.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.プラットフォーム選択リスト: Select the platform where Apex Legends is installed.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.アカウント選択リスト:
Selects the account to use when playing Apex Legends.
(Account management can be done from the "Account" tab.)
プロファイル編集パネル部品.ディスプレイ解像度テストボタン: Tests whether the specified display settings can be displayed correctly.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.コンフィグパネル部品のコンフィグ指定選択リスト: Selects the config to load when playing with this profile.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.ビデオコンフィグパネル部品のビデオコンフィグ指定選択リスト: Selects the video config to load when playing with this profile.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.コンフィグパネル部品のコンフィグ読み取り専用チェックボックス: Sets whether to make the config file read-only during playtime.
プロファイル編集パネル部品.ビデオコンフィグパネル部品のビデオコンフィグ読み取り専用チェックボックス: Sets whether to make the video config file read-only during playtime.

3.25:
<Display Scaling Mode>
・No scaling
    The displayed screen will be placed in the center of the display at its original size.
    If the resolution is set smaller than the display resolution, black bars will appear in the remaining area.

・Stretched
    The displayed screen will be stretched to fit the display "without maintaining the aspect ratio".
    Even if the aspect ratio is different, it will be stretched to display.
    ※ This setting is recommended when stretching the resolution ※

・Centered
    The displayed screen will be stretched to fit the display "while maintaining the aspect ratio".
    If the aspect ratio is different, black bars will appear in the remaining area.

Design.Theme;Desc:
User interface theme
(Requires application restart to apply)

Display.Resolution_Width;Desc: Resolution (width) of the main display in normal use
Display.Resolution_Height;Desc: Resolution (height) of the main display in normal use
Display.RefreshRate;Desc: Refresh rate of the main display in normal use

General.EAapp_Config_Folder_Path;Desc:
Folder where EA app config files are saved.
If left blank or a non-existent folder is specified, it will be acquired automatically.
*Normally, it is recommended to leave this blank.*
General.EAapp_Config_File_Name;Desc:
File name of the EA app config file.
This item is required if the platform you are playing on is EA app.
*This config file differs depending on the account, so if you play with multiple accounts,
you will need to change the file name each time you switch accounts.*

Discord_RPC.Enable;Desc:
Whether to display LegendUtil status on your Discord profile
(Requires application restart to apply)
Discord_RPC.Language;Desc: Language of the Rich Presence displayed on your Discord profile

Update.CheckForUpdatesOnAppLaunch;Name: Check for updates on app launch
Update.CheckForUpdatesOnAppLaunch;Desc: Whether to automatically check for updates on app launch
Update.ReleaseChannel;Desc: Release channel of the version to install during updates
Update.ReleaseChannel;Custom_2:
Release: Official release build.
This option exists for the future and is currently the same as Beta.

Beta / Beta Only: Beta build.
Less stable than Release, but more stable than Dev or Nightly.
Beta Only will not update to Release.

Development: Development build.
Released at any time by developers, less stable than Release or Beta, but more stable than Nightly.

Nightly: Nightly build.
Released with every push to the repository, this is the most unstable build available.
In some cases, it may not even start.

UI_General.Language;Desc: Display language of the user interface

UI_MainMenu.News_Enable;Desc:
Whether to display news on the main menu
(Requires application restart to apply)
UI_MainMenu.News_Language;Desc: Language of the news displayed on the main menu
UI_MainMenu.ServerStatus_Enable;Desc:
Whether to display server status information on the main menu
(Requires application restart to apply)
UI_MainMenu.ServerStatus_Region;Desc: Region of the server status displayed on the main menu
UI_MainMenu.ServerStatus_Region;List: Asia,Eastern Europe,Western Europe,South America,Central America,Eastern America,Western America
UI_MainMenu.MapRotation_Enable;Desc:
Whether to display map rotation information on the main menu
(Requires application restart to apply)
UI_MainMenu.MapRotation_RemainingTime;Name: [Experimental] Map Rotation - Detailed Remaining Time Display
UI_MainMenu.MapRotation_RemainingTime;Desc:
Displays the remaining time for each mode in the map rotation with detailed updates every second.
*This setting is experimental. Enabling it may increase memory usage.
(Requires application restart to apply)

-anticheat_settings=SettingsDX11___dot__.Desc:
DirectX 11 でゲームを起動します。
DirectX 12 を使用する方がパフォーマンスと安定性に優れる傾向にあるため、このオプションを使用することは推奨されません。
DirectX 12 でパフォーマンスが安定しない場合のみ使用してください。
-anticheat_settings=SettingsDX11___dot__.Name: DirectX 11 でゲームを起動
-anticheat_settings=SettingsDX11___dot__.AdditionalButtonText: DirectX 12/11 に関する詳しい情報 (Reddit)

-forcenovsync.Desc: Forces Vertical Sync (V-SYNC) to be disabled.
-forcenovsync.Name: Disable Vertical Sync (V-SYNC)

-fullscreen.Desc: Launches the game in fullscreen mode.
-fullscreen.Name: Fullscreen

-high.Desc:
Changes the CPU priority of Apex Legends to "High".
This may improve performance, but it may also increase CPU usage by Apex Legends and cause system or other application instability.
-high.Name: Change priority to "High"

-limitvsconst.Desc: Limits the number of vertex shaders to 256.  This may improve performance.
-limitvsconst.Name: Change vertex shader count

-noff.Desc:
Disables the controller's vibration function in-game. The vibration function will no longer work in-game.
Disabling this may improve performance.
-noff.Name: Disable controller vibration

-nojoy.Desc:
Disables the controller's joystick function. You will no longer be able to operate the game using the joystick.
Disabling this may improve performance.
-nojoy.Name: Disable controller joystick function

-nomouse.Desc:
Disables mouse functionality. You will no longer be able to operate the game using the mouse.
Disabling this may improve performance.
-nomouse.Name: Disable mouse function

-novid.Desc: Disables the notoriously loud EA splash movie to shorten startup time and prevent eardrum damage.
-novid.Name: Disable splash movie

-preload.Desc:
Prioritizes loading necessary data during game startup.
This may improve performance during gameplay, but it may also increase RAM usage and loading time.
-preload.Name: Prioritize loading necessary data at startup

-refresh.Choices: Specify Input,60 Hz,95 Hz,120 Hz,144 Hz,240 Hz,360 Hz
-refresh.Desc: Sets the upper limit for the refresh rate.
-refresh.Name: Refresh Rate Limit

-threads.Desc:
Changes the number of CPU threads used by Apex Legends.
Normally, Apex Legends automatically uses all threads, so no configuration is necessary.
Change this setting if you want to limit the number of threads used by Apex Legends.
-threads.Name: Change thread count

+building_cubemaps.Desc: This argument is automatically enabled when resolution changes are enabled.
+building_cubemaps.Name: Resolution Change Setting Only | +building_cubemaps

+cl_forcepreload.Desc:
Preloads data such as maps and sounds needed during gameplay.
This may improve performance during gameplay, but it may also increase RAM usage and loading times.
+cl_forcepreload.Name: Preload data needed during gameplay

+cl_liveapi_allow_requests.Desc: Allows processing and execution of received requests.
+cl_liveapi_allow_requests.Name: Allow processing and execution of received requests

+cl_liveapi_pretty_print_log.Desc: Formats JSON output to be more human-readable.
+cl_liveapi_pretty_print_log.Name: Format JSON output

+cl_liveapi_use_protobuf.Desc:
If enabled, uses protobuf as the serialization format.
If disabled, uses JSON as the serialization format.
+cl_liveapi_use_protobuf.Name: Use protobuf as serialization format

+cl_liveapi_ws_keepalive.Desc: Specifies the interval at which to send pings to any connected servers.
+cl_liveapi_ws_keepalive.Name: WebSocket | Ping interval

+cl_liveapi_ws_retry_count.Desc: Specifies the number of retries before giving up on a connection.
+cl_liveapi_ws_retry_count.Name: WebSocket | Retry count

+cl_liveapi_ws_retry_time.Desc: Specifies the time (in seconds) to wait before retrying.
+cl_liveapi_ws_retry_time.Name: WebSocket | Retry time

+cl_liveapi_ws_servers.Desc:
Specifies the WebSocket servers.
Separate multiple servers with a comma (,).
+cl_liveapi_ws_servers.Name: WebSocket | Server list

+cl_ragdoll_collide.Desc: Changes the physics behavior of dead bodies, etc.  This may improve performance.
+cl_ragdoll_collide.Name: Change physics behavior

+cl_showfps.Desc:
Enables the overlay display of performance information such as FPS and ping to the server.
This setting is the same as the "Performance Display" setting in the in-game settings.
+cl_showfps.Name: Enable performance information overlay

+cl_showpos.Desc: Enables the overlay display of information such as username, position coordinates, and movement speed.
+cl_showpos.Name: Enable player information overlay

+exec.Desc:
Loads the autoexec file and applies the configuration when the game starts.
You can edit the autoexec from the "Autoexec" tab.
+exec.Name: Load autoexec

+fps_max.Choices: Unlimited,Specify Input,60 FPS,95 FPS,120 FPS,144 FPS,240 FPS,360 FPS
+fps_max.Desc: Sets the upper limit for FPS.
+fps_max.Name: FPS Limit

+mat_queue_mode.Desc: Changes the CPU threading mode used by the material system. Depending on the setting, this may improve performance.
+mat_queue_mode.Name: Change threading mode
